parameters.name: ProgramConfig
parameters.description: The configurations of the episode list. For more information, see the **ProgramConfig** section of this topic.

parameters.name: ProgramId
parameters.description: The ID of the episode list. If the episode list was created by calling the [AddPlaylistItems](~~2848078~~) operation, check the value of the response parameter ProgramId to obtain the ID.

parameters.name: ProgramItems
parameters.description: The episodes that you want to add to the production studio. The value is a JSON string. For more information, see the **InputProgramItem** section of this topic.
